content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ i think the macchiato sweater & beanie crochet patterns might be one of my all-time favorite sets i mean mommy and me sweater and beanie sets are just precious right i knew i needed to create this in child sizes and my awesome testers for the adult sizes were all for it if you are looking for a fall family photo sweater this is it how adorable would this crochet sweater be for those christmas cards so if you want to crochet a sweater or beanie for this season but are a little nervous don t worry i ve got you the macchiato sweater & hat crochet patterns come with video tutorials 1 **pattern pack discounts** use code save10 for 10% off two patterns save15 for 15% off 3 patterns save20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns cannot be combined with other offers **crochet hook ** 5 0 mm h furls hook 2 **notions ** yarn needle scissors **yarn ** wonderfluff by wecrochet 3 -in finnley heather bulky weight yarn **yardage ** 1 year 300 yds 275m 2 year 450 yds 411m 4 year 500 yds 457m 6 year 600 yds 548m 8 year 700 yds 640m 10/12 years 800 yds 731m 14/16 years 850 yds 777m **abbreviations/stitches ** chain- chain rs- right side single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch sts- stitches ws- wrong side **gauge** 13 5 single_crochet sts and 15 row = 4 with h-hook **measurements/sizes ** finished bust sizes 1 year 22 56 cm 2 year 25 64 cm 4 year 27 69 cm 6 year 29 74 cm 8 year 30 5 77 cm 10/12 years 32 81 cm 14/16 years 35 5 90 cm *this garment has approx 4 10 cm of ease **skill level ** easy/advanced beginner
